Text: negative covenants in merger agreement Cc legal Mark re the above we are working on a significant number of divestments very important transactions for cashflow reasons totalling potentially over MM US in Europe that are likely triggers I urgently need to address this with you guys Michael Brown wants me to sort out a waiver letter procedure before the weekend Cant get a hold of Lance Could you or Lance give me a shout this morning Thanks Marcus

can you give me a quick shout when youre in this morning I am coordinating our efforts to contribute European mtm assets to liquidity project popeye and would like to make sure we stay coordinated with your efforts including outside counsel retention if any Xs

deals requiring consent Cc Attached please a write up of the transactionsdispositions currently underway that may require consent for completion from Dynegy or in some cases consent for continuing discussions All of these are very urgent as they give the possibility to raise cash please call me to discuss if you have any questions Thanks Marcus

RE did you ever fax anythingthanks sir god knows how long for Ill still be here as I may stay at home from tomorrow if I dont get a new contract from Jan still have days holidays left this year Original Message From Hodge Jeffrey T Sent December To Von Bock Und Polach Marcus Subject RE did you ever fax anything Marcus Still waiting to get something back from Haedicke Jeff Original Message From Von Bock Und Polach Marcus Sent Monday December AM To Hodge Jeffrey T Subject did you ever fax anything

Jeff sorry to be a nag any luck with the Arcos resolutions Two more matters we are trying to sell the Norway business by the end of the week to yield some USD million and hopefully five times that for the book Ill call you later but well need another resolution and PoA for Eric for that it goes to the Creditors committee today we have a lot of smaller issues with contracts closeout etc here and NO officer of ECTRIC or ECT Europe Inc left I would like to make Eric Shaw an officer of these companies very urgently so we do not continue to bleed value he so far refuses to become a director which would be the best solution
